exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.description: Start on hands and knees. Alternate between arching your back up (cat) and dropping your belly down (cow).
exercises.orientation_instructions: Position yourself sideways to the camera on hands and knees

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.description: Kneel and sit back on your heels, stretching arms forward on the floor.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Position yourself sideways to the camera while kneeling

exercises.name: Knee-to-Chest Stretch
exercises.description: Lie on your back and pull one knee toward your chest while keeping the other leg flat.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Lie on your back with your side facing the camera

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.description: Extend arms to sides and make small circles, gradually increasing size.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Face the camera with arms extended to your sides

exercises.name: Wall Slides
exercises.description: Stand with back against wall, arms in 'W' position. Slide arms up to 'Y' position and back down.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Stand sideways to the camera with your back against a wall

exercises.name: Cross-Body Stretch
exercises.description: Pull one arm across your body at shoulder height using the opposite hand.

exercises.name: Doorway Stretch
exercises.description: Stand in doorway with arms on frame at 90 degrees, gently lean forward.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Stand sideways to the camera in a doorway

exercises.name: Straight Leg Raises
exercises.description: Lie on back, one knee bent, one leg straight. Raise straight leg to height of bent knee.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Lie on your back with your side facing the camera

exercises.name: Wall Sits
exercises.description: Lean against wall with knees at 90 degrees as if sitting in a chair.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Stand sideways to the camera with your back against a wall

exercises.name: Step-Ups
exercises.description: Step up onto a low platform, focusing on using the stepping leg to lift your body.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Position yourself sideways to the camera near a step

exercises.name: Clamshells
exercises.description: Lie on side with knees bent. Keep feet together and raise top knee like a clamshell opening.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Lie on your side facing the camera

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.description: Lie on back with arms up and knees at 90 degrees. Lower opposite arm and leg while keeping back flat.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Lie on your back with your side facing the camera

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.description: On hands and knees, extend opposite arm and leg while maintaining a stable spine.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Position yourself sideways to the camera on hands and knees

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold a push-up position on forearms, keeping body in a straight line.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Position yourself sideways to the camera in plank position

exercises.name: Bridge
exercises.description: Lie on back with knees bent, lift hips toward ceiling, squeezing glutes at top.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Lie on your back with your side facing the camera

exercises.name: Ankle Circles
exercises.description: Lift foot off ground and rotate ankle in circles, both clockwise and counterclockwise.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Sit facing the camera with one leg extended

exercises.name: Alphabet Writing
exercises.description: Use your big toe to trace each letter of the alphabet in the air.
exercises.orientation_instructions: Sit facing the camera with one leg extended

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Stand on both feet, raise up onto toes, then slowly lower back down.

exercises.name: Single-Leg Balance
exercises.description: Stand on one foot, maintaining balance. Progress by closing eyes.
